content: modeknit slippy cowl designed by annie modesitt special stitches & techniques sl 1 - slip one stitch keeping yarn to the wrong side of work insert right hand needle purlwise into stitch and slip onto right needle k2tog-l - knit 2 decrease with a left slant knit 2 stitches together so the working needle is pointing to the left as it enters the stitch decrease will slant to the left aka ssk k2togtbl or skp k2-decrease bind off k2tog-l slip the stitch just created back onto the left needle and repeat work to the end and pull the fiber tail through the last loop provisional cast on this is a term used to describe a temporary cast on which can be easily removed later the basics leaving a row of live stitches to be slipped one size 22 /56cm circ x 7 /18cm deep onto a needle and worked one favorite skill level k2-easy method is to crochet a chain in waste yarn with at least as many stitches as you would worsted version like to cast on tie off the end of the chain fiber
